results.content:
Just ended the core part of the course. For me it was a perfect oppurtunity to learn more about basic concepts of Deep Learning that were not properly explained during my AI classes. I think the strongest side of this course was to not learn syntax and oblige to write ANN using numpy. It was totally a new experience for me and finally allowed me to understand basic concepts.

My level before course: I could use several API and I knew the concept of backpropag but I was not capable of calculate this on my own.

results.content: The Machine Learning Master himself, Lazy Programmer, delivered as per my expectation. It was an amazing journey to be taken through the math of deep learning to get to the root of it all. I am glad I took this course.
results.content_html: The Machine Learning Master himself, Lazy Programmer, delivered as per my expectation. It was an amazing journey to be taken through the math of deep learning to get to the root of it all. I am glad I took this course.

results.content: Really good course. It is great that it has a theoretical approach to machine learning and that they build the models only using numpy (interesting to see how, with only a little coding you can actually build a pretty well performing model). There is some repetition in the high level discussion, but I think it is mainly because some sections are also used in their other courses. I especially appertiate that I got an indepth answer to my observation/question.
results.content_html: Really good course. There is some repetition in the high level discussion, but I think it is mainly because some sections are also used in their other courses. I especially appertiate that I got an indepth answer to my observation/question.

results.content: It has been an insanely challenging journey for me up until this point in the course (I didn't exactly follow the prerequisite instructions like the Lazy Programmer suggested). But I am glad I stuck with it and I'm proud to accomplish what I did. I have learned a lot thanks to this course.

But I am glad I stuck with it and I'm proud to accomplish what I did. I have learned a lot thanks to this course.

results.content: one of the best data science/machine learning courses I have ever taken
results.content_html: one of the best data science/machine learning courses I have ever taken

results.content: Noch sehr niedriges Level, aber es wird gut erklärt, nichts ausgelassen
results.content_html: Noch sehr niedriges Level, aber es wird gut erklärt, nichts ausgelassen

results.content: I am feeling extremely grateful to have this course. The course covers fundamental concepts and building blocks of deep learning and neural networks.
results.content_html: I am feeling extremely grateful to have this course. The course covers fundamental concepts and building blocks of deep learning and neural networks.

results.content: I have really enjoyed the course. It's very well structured and the important thing is it makes me practice more my math and coding.
results.content_html: I have really enjoyed the course. It's very well structured and the important thing is it makes me practice more my math and coding.

results.content: The structure of the course was a little difficult to follow. I would have preferred the code to be deployed directly after the theoretical formulation of each problem. And I would still like a couple of examples from the git files to be formulated as an exercise. But I don't know if they exist in your other courses. Otherwise it was very interesting.

response.content:
Thanks for your feedback!

> I would have preferred the code to be deployed directly after the theoretical formulation of each problem.

That is what we did. Please use the Q&A if you find any instances where this is not the case. I'll be happy to look into them.

> And I would still like a couple of examples from the git files to be formulated as an exercise.

ALL of the code in this course is meant to be an exercise. Don't cheat by just watching the lectures straight through!

results.content: Great advice, to know how these machine learning algorithms work step by step, how to calculate them mathematically and to implement them in coding.  I highly recommend it to any data science student.
results.content_html: Great advice, to know how these machine learning algorithms work step by step, how to calculate them mathematically and to implement them in coding. I highly recommend it to any data science student.

results.content: It was great. Some things a little more difficult because of rusty math skill but that is okay!

results.content: Great course! I finally understand back-propagation.
